org.dbflute.testing.mock

クラス BehaviorArgumentCaptor<CB extends org.dbflute.cbean.ConditionBean>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dbflute.testing.mock.BehaviorArgumentCaptor<CB>
  • 型パラメータ:
    CB - Type of ConditionBean implementation

    public class BehaviorArgumentCaptor<CB extends org.dbflute.cbean.ConditionBean>
extends Object
    Behavior argument captor to capture ConditionBean for further assertion.

    This captor captures Behavior's lambda argument by using an internal ArgumentCaptor. When getCB() was called, it creates a new CB instance and applies lambda and then returns it.

    Example of capturing ConditionBean: 

    
 BehaviorArgumentCaptor<MemberCB> captor = BehaviorArgumentCaptor.of(MemberCB.class);
 verify(mockBhv).selectEntity(captor.capture());
 MemberCB cb = captor.getCB();
 assertThat(cb, hasCondition("memberId", equal(1)));
    作成者:
    taktos

      • BehaviorArgumentCaptor

        public BehaviorArgumentCaptor(Class<CB> clazz)
        Creates a new BehaviorArgumentCaptor of clazz.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • capture

        public org.dbflute.bhv.readable.CBCall<CB> capture()
        Returns captor to capture argument. This method must be used inside of verification.
        戻り値:
        lambda argument captor
        関連項目:
        ArgumentCaptor.capture()

      • getCB

        public CB getCB()
        Returns a new CB instance that was applied lambda callback.

        If verified method was called multiple times, this method returns the latest one. If you want to get all ConditionBean, use getAllCB() method instead.

        戻り値:
        a new CB
        関連項目:
        getAllCB(), ArgumentCaptor.getValue()

      • getAllCB

        public List<CB> getAllCB()
        Returns new CB instances that were applied lambda callback.
        戻り値:
        new CB instances.
        関連項目:
        ArgumentCaptor.getAllValues()

      • of

        public static <CB extends org.dbflute.cbean.ConditionBean> BehaviorArgumentCaptor<CB> of(Class<CB> clazz)
        Create a new BehaviorArgumentCaptor of clazz.
        パラメータ:
        clazz - Class of ConditionBean implementation.
        戻り値:
        new captor
